description.narrative: In the upcoming summer 2021 Baptisternes B?rne- og ungdomsforbund plans to carry out Partnership Identification in Myanmar. The purpose of the trip is to investigate the possibility of forming a partnership with New Life Center, which is an orphanage for youths located in Kalaymyo. The organization is supported by New Life Center Support group in Denmark from whom we became aware of the goals and visions of NLC. We find that some of the goals and visions are in close relation to BBU vision of making youth strong and independent individuals for the society and leaders for the future. The potential fruit of this trip is to get an in-depth knowledge of the expectations, values and goals that we have in common and how this will lay as a foundation for future partnership through DUF international.
